divs: Sighting Detailsi was on interstate 70 traveling east by lakeside amusement park. i was riding in the backseat of a taxi and noticed something hovering to the south of the interstate. i watched it thinking it had to be a helicopter because it wasnt moving like airplanes do. i also notised the sun reflecting off of the bottom of it and it was a shiny silver. It didnt last long but then it just shot right up into the sky and i watched it vanish. it wasnt like anything i've ever seen before. It all happened so fast but i'm sure it wasnt an airplane or helicopter.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around November 6th 2009
Summary: silver object hovered in the sky and shot straight up fast and was gone
